data.title: Asturian Property: Properties in Spain
data.meta_description: Ads of Properties for sale in Spain of Asturian Property. Find and buy your property in Spain.
data.text:
1/44

(8%)

480,000 €

2,449 €/m²

196 m², Plot: 800 m², 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms

This property is situated in Ribadesella with outstanding views out over the estuary. It has a south facing aspect and is in an area that has views of estuary, mountains and sea. The property is built on a terraced slope with very attractive landscaping. It has 2 floors built into the slope of the hill. On the upper floor there is a fully fitted kitchen with a 'cocina de leña'. This is similar to an Aga. There is a dining area adjacent. The lounge faces south and has a huge window that takes advantage of the spectacular views. There is a wood burning stove in addition to the central heating to make it nice and cosy in Winter and a fantastic terrace with incredible views. You can dine out on the terrace during the Summer months. The ensuite master bedroom is also on this floor with its own balcony. Downstairs is a large garage with space for 3 cars. There are also 2 more double bedrooms on this floor with a bathroom as well. There is a possibility to buy more land.

Ref: MX006

1/22

3,000,000 €

2,519 €/m²

1,191 m², Plot: 6,000 m², 12 bedrooms, 15 bathrooms

Stunning traditional Asturian manor style stone house and English style pavilion, set on a plot of land of 6,000 m2 of manicured gardens and forest. The property was fully restored between 1996 and 1999. The owners took exquisite care on maintaining the features and main characteristics of the original house, but implementing new foundations and integrating the original features into a modern hidden structure and facilities, giving as a result a solid, core structure of pillars, slabs and beams made of reinforced concrete, all of it overlayed with the original house’s elements such as wood, stone and forge. It was a labour of love. The property is just within 10km of stunning beaches such as Rodiles, La Griega, La Isla and La Espasa beach, and 8km from the market town of Villaviciosa. Asturias airport is 72km away, while Santander´s airport and ferry port is 148km from the property. The house is 815m2 over 3 floors and it is sold furnished. On the ground floor we can find

Ref: M0575

1/39

(29%)

250,000 €

683 €/m²

In a mountain area

Detached, 366 m², Plot: 90,000 m², 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom

ORIGINAL PRICE WAS 350,000 EURO. Traditional stone house with semidetached barn with a plot of land of 9ha with private access to beautiful Cares River. The property has 366m2 in total. The house is habitable and has a kitchen, living room on the ground floor, and 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom on the first floor. There is an attic for storage. The barn is semidetached to the house and has 2 floors. There is also a storage shed on the land. The property is located 5km from Panes, 16km from Cabrales, 18km from the nearest beach, 20km from Picos de Europa National Park, and 80km from Santander airport.

Ref: AAL004

1/10

249,600 €

Infiesto

6 bedrooms, 1 bathroom

Fantastic full of character traditional Asturian house with semidetached barn of 160m2 set on a plot of land of 3,160m2 with fruit trees, oak trees, olive trees, etc. It has wonderful mountain views. The house was built in 1807 and has two floor and attic of 150m2 per floor. It has an entrance porch, hall, kitchen, living room of 40m2 with fireplace, 6 bedrooms, 1 bathroom and typical wooden balcony. It is packed with original features. 14km from Infiesto, 17km from Villaviciosa and 18km from Colunga and the beach.

Ref: M0400

1/15

480,000 €

Plot: 140,000 m², 5 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms

he privileged elevated position of this land with several stone built dwellings and agricultural buildings is ideal for several aspects of business development: agriculture, horticulture, eco/agri-tourism, eco-energy, property. The 140,000 m2 of land is on slopes viewing the Picos de Europa mountain range and lies above the winter frost layer, rendering it suitable for the cultivation of a wide range of crops/animal husbandry. Alternatively, 12,000 m2 is in the permitted building zone so that the existing buildings may be developed for other uses. These buildings consist of: A 2 storey dwelling house with traditional glazed gallery in need of refurbishment A stone house with stabling/storage space underneath Another separate stone house 2 stone stables 2 Farm barns Garaging for 3 vehicles The other land of this property is 30,000m2 woodland, some as commercial plantation, and 110,000m2 pasture and horticultural growing. Worthy of note is the water supply to

Ref: M0551

1/10

260,000 €

2,000 €/m²

130 m², Plot: 257 m², 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms

ORIGINAL PRICE WAS 300,000 EURO. Fabulous detached house located next to Pas river and enjoying wonderful views to the mountains. Located in a rural area but only 1.3km from Puente Viesgo (supermarket, bakery, pharmacy, restaurants, etc), 3km from popular Monte Castillo Caves, 12km from Torrelavega, 22km from the nearest beach and the Dunas de Liencres Natural Park, and 32km from Santander. The house comes with a plot of land of 257m2, and it is ready to live. It has a open plan kitchen/dining room/living room with fireplace, 3 bedrooms (one with fireplace and balcony overlooking the river and mountains) and 2 bathrooms. It has been restored with great care and good quality materials.

Ref: MF006

1/24

499,000 €

1,540 €/m²

324 m², Plot: 225 m², 4 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms

WONDERFUL SEMI-DETACHED HOUSE, nestled on a south-facing slope, with privileged views over a bucolic valley where beautiful rural villages full of tradition are located. The home is located in the village of Tresgrandas, which is just 3km from the beaches and accessible from the A8 motorway, just one hour away from both Santander and Oviedo, capitals of Cantabria and Asturias respectively, where all services can be found, including flights to the UK, and in the case of Santander the Ferry to Portsmouth and Plymouth. The house, which was completely renovated in 2016, maintain a traditional external appearance that is fully integrated with the environment, preserving the stone facades built in 1864. However, when crossing its original gate, you access an absolutely avant-garde space, with bright and welcoming spaces, which are well differentiated thanks to the different entrances of natural light, and enriched by timeless design furniture, and the greenery of the plants that

Ref: LP031

1/10

950,000 €

1,234 €/m²

770 m², Plot: 4,000 m², 7 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms

ORIGINAL PRICE WAS 1.8 MILLION. Typical Asturian Palace located near Rodiles beach and set on a plot of land of 4,000m2 with permission to build, all fenced by stone wall. The property comprises a baroque style palace built in the 18th century with the family coats of arms, semidetached large stone barn, guests house, pigeon house and wooden outbuilding with BBQ, toilet and eating area on the garden. The total built area is 770 m2 with a total of 2 kitchens, 3 living rooms, 7 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms. The palace has stunning original chestnut floors almost throughout the first floor. From this level, there is a direct access to the beautiful gardens with centenary trees. All the ground floors are garages and barns oozing potential. The property is just 2.8km from popular Rodiles beach and 6,6km from the market town of Villaviciosa. Asturias airport is 70km away, while Santander´s airport and ferry port is 150km from the property.

Ref: TN002

1/1

3,000,000 €

8 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms

Opulent architectonic jewel of colonial style built in 1914 as a holiday home. Located in tranquil coastal village in El Franco area, 130km from Oviedo, 110 from Lugo and 80km from the airport. The palace has 600m2 per floor with 16,000m2 of land with wonderful French style gardens with a vast variety of trees and flowers and a vegetable garden. It is ready to live in. Ground floor: striking hall, kitchen with eating area, 1 en suite bedroom, toilet, living room, dining room, sitting room, library, study and large entrance porch. First floor: 2 en suite bedrooms, 5 further bedrooms, 1 toilet, meeting room, sewing/ironing room and large terrace. Attic: 1 toilet and rest of space without layout. There is also a: Gardeners house (casa de jardinero in the enclosed aerial map) Annexed building of two floors of 160m2 each with garage for 5 cars, barns, warehouses and workshop on the ground floor and living space on the first floor (casa de vacas on the aerial map) Another garage for 6 cars

Ref: 0295.00816

1/13

600,000 €

333 €/m²

In a coastal area

1,800 m², Plot: 205,000 m², 12 bedrooms

Amazing property with more than 205,000 m2 of land and several constructions that exceed 1,800m2, swimming pool, a basketball / handball court, as well as large meadows where there were two football fields. The property was used years ago for horseback riding and paintball. It was the first paintball business in Asturias. The property has possibilities of expansion and can be used for many activities. There is also a possibility to have 12 wooden cabins on the land (already approved by the town hall). It is currently licensed as a Farm-School or Youth camp, and has accommodated more than 250 children. After a decade without activity, at this time the facilities are not in good condition, but it oozes potential. The property borders Bedon River on one side, where all kinds of activities can be organised, and on the other side, there is a hill that has a drop of about 300 meters, ideal to install a zip line. There is a pedestrian path that runs parallel to the river and reaches

Ref: M0574

1/25

390,000 €

1,275 €/m²

306 m², Plot: 38,000 m², 4 bedrooms, 1 bathroom

ORIGINAL PRICE WAS 420,000 EURO. This fully furnished 4 bedroomed house has beautiful views of the mountains. The main house of 306 m2 (3293 ft2) is conveniently distributed with all the living space on the 1st Floor, while the basement floor provides a generous garage and the attic offers yet more space. UPVC windows, oil central heating and the wood burning stove ensure winter comfort. In addition there is an adjacent house for total renovation and 2 barns. Part of the 38000m2 of land is in the local development zone and so able to be built upon. Main House: Basement Garage of 102 m2 (1097 ft2). 1st Floor: 102 m2 (1097 ft2) comprising Entrance Hall with solid fuel stove, Sitting Room, fitted Kitchen/Diner, Bathroom, 4 Bedrooms. Attic Floor: 102 m2 (1097 ft2) with separate entrance via outside steps. The outside area provides generous parking, a terrace for outdoor leisure, and a well tended garden/horticultural area. The property is in a little-known village yet only

Ref: MX003

1/45

500,000 €

1,901 €/m²

263 m², Plot: 1,200 m², 7 bedrooms, 7 bathrooms

This property is the equivalent of and English B & B and has 7 ensuite bedrooms and 1,200m2 of land. It is situated in the quiet village 10 minutes from the beach and 15 minutes from Ribadesella and Arriondas. The property has 263m2 over 3 floors. The ground floor has a reception, guest dining room, lounge with wood burning stove, kitchen and access to the garden. The first floor has a living room and large library as well as 3 ensuite bedrooms. The second floor is in the roof space and has another 4 ensuite bedrooms and an ironing room. All the bedrooms have bathrooms and central heating. They have been maintained through an annual maintenance contract. Outside is a beautiful garden bordered by a stream. There are various outbuildings with different uses - boiler house, utility area and children's play zone. The property also have a paved parking area. It has the highest category for casas rural - 3 trisqueles

Ref: MLGV1206

1/45

380,000 €

955 €/m²

Infiesto

398 m², Plot: 95,000 m², 7 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms

Facing South, this property is set in a rural location some 15 minutes from Arriondas and has wonderful views of the Picos de Europa and the whole Parres valley. Built around 1900, there are 2 houses joined together, a stable, a storage area and all set in 95,000m2 of land. House 1 has 90m2 per floor and comprises a kitchen, living room, 4 bedrooms, a bathroom and a storage area. House 2 has 80m2 per floor and comprises a kitchen, living room, 3 bedrooms, a bathroom and a storage area. The houses are accessed by an unpaved road suitable for vehicles and are supplied by spring water.

Ref: AL002.2735

1/41

760,000 €

1,204 €/m²

631 m², Plot: 20,000 m², 6 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms

This fantastic property of about 540m2, was completely renovated in 2012 and comprises 3 floors. The ground floor has a large living room with a fireplace. There is a dining area with a large Oak table seating 16 people for meals and a spacious fully equipped kitchen. In addition there is a large utility area, a bathroom with toilet and shower and a wine cellar. On the first floor there are 4 bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms. There is another large living room with an open fire as well as a large galleried room with fantastic views to the hills in the distance. The attic space has another bedroom, a bathroom and a dressing room and a third living room. In the same living space but completely independent, there is an apartment of 45m2 with one bedroom, a bathroom, an open plan kitchen diner and a workshop/studio area. Separate from the main building is a large boiler house with a 1000 litre oil tank, boilers for the heating and hot water, and a separate back up water

Ref: CAS0277

1/51

525,000 €

926 €/m²

567 m², Plot: 6,000 m², 6 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms

Large traditional Asturian stone house with semidetached cider press barn, garage, typical Asturian granary and flat plot of land of 6,000 m2, with beautiful views and excellent location. The situation is rural but just 6km from the beach, 8km from Villaviciosa and 20km from Gijón. The house has 2 floors of 282 m2 in total. Ground floor: hallway, kitchen of about 25m2, sitting/dining-room of about 48m2, and 1 bathroom. This floor has direct access to the garage of about 72m2 over two floors, located at the back of the house. First floor: 6 bedrooms (2 currently used as offices, 1 as a painting studio & 1 as a dressing-room), sitting/TV room, and 2 bathrooms (1 with shower & 1 with bath). The house has oil fired central heating with a 1,000 litre tank. The cider press barn is semidetached to the west of the house and has about 87m2.

Ref: M0566
